content: Gunnison River, south of Orchard City, Colorado…”This cluster of counties on Colorado’s Western Slope—along with three counties just across the border in eastern Utah—has warmed more than 2 degrees Celsius, double the global average. Spanning more than 30,000 square miles, it is the largest 2C hot spot in the Lower 48” a Washington Post analysis found. …”This giant climate hot spot is robbing the West of its water” by Juliet Eilperin, Aug. 7, 2020.__no.0542, 2020. #Colorado #Utah #globalwarming #watershortages
